description: Micro-Epsilon TIM Connect and Optris PIX Connect are programs that allow users to record and analyze RAVI video using a compatible thermal camera, such as the Optris PI450 or thermoIMAGER TIM 200. The software may be used by professionals in a variety of fields that deal with thermal analysis, such as scientists and engineers.
Optris PIX Connect can be used to record radiometric video sequences in the RAVI or WMV formats. It can also be used to capture radiometric snapshots as .TIFF images.
Micro-Epsilon TIM Connect can be used to record radiometric video sequences in the RAVI or AVI formats. It can also be used to capture radiometric snapshots as TIFF images.
